articles.content: Sheriff's base is in Transnistria, a breakaway region not recognised internationally, and, following Russia's invasion of Ukraine, UEFA made the decision that matches in their competitions should not… [+570 chars]

articles.title: Shahid Afridi on his daughter waving Indian flag during Asia Cup 2022: 'Pakistani flags weren't...' - India TV News
articles.description: Pakistan's former captain Shahid Afridi revealed that there was a shortage of Pakistan flags at the venue, so his daughter waved the Tricolour during the game.
articles.content: India and Pakistan locked horns in an enthralling Super 4 match of the Asia Cup 2022 at the Dubai International Stadium on September 4. While it was a nail-biting match where Babar Azam's team defeat… [+2023 chars]
